Title: Relates to the inspection of meters and other apparatus used for regulating and supplying gas or electricity by the division of weights and measures
Summary: Directs the division of weights and measures to inspect meters and other apparatus used for regulating and supplying gas or electricity to verify that such apparatus are properly maintained and calibrated.
LawCode: Amd ยง179, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to the inspection of gas and electricity meters
